gameticket_package

Class sportfan

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameticket_package.sportfan

  • public class sportfan
extends java.lang.Object
    SINGLE RESPONSIBILITY SOLID PRINCIPLE applied here where this class only cares for the user and things he can do as reserving,cancelling ,update seat or making a bet. CALCULATED DATA MEMBERS is applied here. this class contains different access modifiers this class is for the sport fan so he can reserve, delete, change a seat or make a bet each fan has his own name and ID and bet points he won or lost.

      This method allows sport fan to cancel a ticket reservation and minimise the number of reserved tickets again also checks if the seat is reserved and the date is before the match by more than 3 days as it passes the information to the delete method in the game class

      CALCULATED DATA MEMEBER is applied here to bet point user gain or loose This method displays all the sport fans ticket they reserved Also each sport fan name and ID Also the bet points he won or lost

      Calculated data member is applied here This class takes the amount of money that user wants to make a bet with and if he won the bet his money is duplicated else his money will be lost on him

      • buyticket

        public void buyticket(java.lang.String categ,
                      seat a,
                      game g)
        This method allows a sport fan to reserve a ticket of certain match and certain category
        Parameters:
        categ - category of the seat he wants
        a - object from the seat he wanted as the array of seats is hard coded with the seats data in the main function
        g - object from the game he wanted as the array of games is hard coded with the seats data in the main function

      • upgrade

        public void upgrade(int num,
                    game g,
                    java.lang.String categ,
                    seat a,
                    java.lang.String categupdate)
        This method upgrades the seat that the user wants
        Parameters:
        num - number of the old seat he want to upgrade
        g - the match he want to upgrade the seat in
        categ - the old category of the seat
        a - object of the seat he wants to update
        categupdate - the new category of the seat

      • cancelticket

        public void cancelticket(int num,
                         int date,
                         int m,
                         game g,
                         java.lang.String categ)
        This method allows sport fan to cancel a ticket reservation and minimise the number of reserved tickets again also checks if the seat is reserved and the date is before the match by more than 3 days as it passes the information to the delete method in the game class
        Parameters:
        num - number of the seat that user wants to delete
        date - the day
        m - the month
        g - the match that the user wants cancel his ticket from
        categ - the category of the seat that he wants to cancel

      • makebet

        public void makebet(game g,
                    java.lang.String win,
                    java.lang.String betprice)
        Calculated data member is applied here This class takes the amount of money that user wants to make a bet with and if he won the bet his money is duplicated else his money will be lost on him
        Parameters:
        g - the match that user want to make a bet in
        win - the suggestion that the user think who will win the match
        betprice - the money that the user make a bet on
